software_masters.business_planner

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • software_masters.business_planner.Template

  • public class Template
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be both a representation of a business plan or a business plan outline.
    Since:
    2019-02-23
    Author:
    Wesley Murray, Lee Kendall

      • setCatLimits

        public void setCatLimits(java.lang.String category,
                         int min,
                         int max)
        Sets the minimum and maximum number of templateSections of each category which are allowed. These values are stored in a hash table, mapping the category string to an array of integers. The first position in the array is the minimum, the second is the maximum, and the third is the current number of templateSections in that category.
        Parameters:
        category -
        min -
        max -

      • canCopySection

        public boolean canCopySection(java.lang.String category)
        Parameters:
        category -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the user is allowed to add another templateSection of a given category

      • canRemoveSection

        public boolean canRemoveSection(java.lang.String category)
        Parameters:
        category -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the user is allowed to remove a templateSection of a given category
